reviewText:
Okay, will they EVER release this series for selling in the U.S.?  Been waiting YEARS!  Anytime, people!
I'm seeing 2 newer series with Martin Shaw on Netflix, but nothing on this one.  I would dearly love to see this series in its entirety.
I LOVE this series and have MOST of the episodes on VHS tapes (some taped from their cable airings in the 80s!).  I SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO want DVD versions!!  PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE!!

The Professionals CI 5 Dossier 1 - 4-DVD Box Set ( Private Madness Public Danger / The Female Factor / Old Dog With New Tricks / Killer With A Long Arm / Heroes / Where The Jungle [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 0 Import - Australia ]

Typical English show but it was a good action series. The brashness and sarcasm of the guys was good.  They had a way to pushing the right buttons at the right time and getting away with blue murder. Good action and on screen chemistry made the show for me.
